body_html:
@jmchen-g, That reasoning makes sense from a simplicity of implementation stand point, but then we are technically not adhering to the RFC.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4180
Section 2 item 6 specifically mentions this case. If we aren't going to change it, I suggest we just add this deviation from the standard in the documentation to make it easier for users to know to do the preprocessing. It is also true that CSV is a very de facto standard anyways and there are many variants.
